summary:
Rinko Follower
This is a Follower Mod created as from the original player character of Alexshift.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]Rinko[/b][/size][/color][size=2]
[/size][size=2][b][/b]
She is a two handed sword warrior Standalone Follower.
This is a Follower Mod created as from the original player character of [b]Alexshift[/b].

I created her as follower for him and he gave me his permission to share with all of you here on Nexus.

Hope you like and enjoy with her at least the same I enjoyed creating her.
Have a nice play and see you soon on my next mod.

[size=2]
[b]Name:[/b] Rinko
[b]Race:[/b] Nord
[b]Style combat:[/b] [size=2][size=2]Two handed sword
[/size][/size][b]Location:[/b] Frostfruit Inn, Rorikstead
[b]Marriable:[/b] Yes


[img width=717,height=403]http://i.imgur.com/mCk3QFb.jpg[/img]

[b]
REQUIREMENTS[/b][/size][/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[b]NOTE:[/b] Only if you choose HDT Body in the installer
[size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/font][size=2][size=2]


[size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2]------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]
